
# Author contribution {.unnumbered} 





## Chapter 01: {.unnumbered} 


EM, GM, ST and JPL initiated the study and conceived the conceptual and methodological
approaches with contributions from JA and MS. EM led the writing. GM designed and wrote the
code for all analyses, with contributions from JA, ST and EM. ST designed the null model
approach with contributions from EM, GM and JPL. ELN and MS provided empirical network
data. EM, GM, ST and JPL wrote early versions of the manuscript. All authors contributed
significantly to later versions.
